name: TheLastFish
description:
Actionpacked Shooter underwater.

Story:

A mad mage has turned all sea creatures into roboters.Only one fish didn't get turned over.He has the ability to turn the sea creatures back to normal.But to turn back all sea creatures he has to defeat the mad mage.

Start your journey now!

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys.

Shoot: Click or space.

Controller Support is coming soon.

Playtime: Max 15 min.

Version: 1.0

Original Release Date: 7.3.22

Please comment any feedback or suggestions down below!

If you liked it, please rate it and follow me!
